plans.description: This plan covers damage caused by your car to others and their property, but does not cover any damage caused to your car.

addons.description: Pays up to ₹50 lakh if the car owner is permanently disabled or dies in an accident.
addons.title: For you

addons.description: Pays up to ₹2 lakh per passenger if they are permanently disabled or die in an accident.
addons.title: For your loved ones

addons.description: Get 24x7 help with towing, jump-starts, flat tyres, fuel delivery, lockouts, and more.
addons.title: For car breakdowns

addons.description: Pays up to your legal obligation amount if your paid driver is permanently disabled or dies in an accident.
addons.title: For your driver

plans.description:
This plan covers theft, damage from fire, accidents, and natural disasters, as well as the full cost of replaced parts during repairs.

It also covers accidental damage caused by your car to others and their property.

addons.description: Cover engine and gearbox damage due to floods or heavy rains, as well as engine damage from oil/coolant leakage during an accident.
addons.title: Save yourself from costly engine repairs

addons.description: Pays up to ₹50 lakh if the car owner is permanently disabled or dies in an accident.
addons.title: For you

addons.description: Pays up to ₹2 lakh per passenger if they are permanently disabled or die in an accident.
addons.title: For your loved ones

addons.description: Make a claim without losing your No Claim Bonus (NCB). Valid only for 1 claim.
addons.title: Protect your No Claim Bonus

addons.description:
• 24x7 car breakdown assistance
  • Key repair/replacement up to ₹7,000
  • Accommodation expenses up to ₹6,500 during outstation repairs
addons.title: Be prepared for roadside emergencies

addons.description: Cover the cost of consumables like nuts, bolts, brake oil, engine oil, etc. that get replaced during repairs.
addons.title: Save on repair extras

addons.description: Pays up to your legal obligation amount if your paid driver is permanently disabled or dies in an accident.
addons.title: For your driver

addons.description: Cover theft or damage of items like music system, speakers, and other electrical car accessories
addons.title: Protect your car accessories

addons.description: Cover theft or damage of items like alloy wheels, seat covers, and other non-electrical accessories.
addons.title: Secure non-electrical items
